summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in the "Kingdom of Sahali." A character is seen standing in a desert landscape, facing a large, multi-tiered pagoda structure in the distance. The surroundings include rocky terrain and sparse vegetation. There is also a large statue partially visible on the right side of the image. The sky is clear with a few clouds. Text in both English and another language is displayed, indicating the location within the game.
